item.title: Best Practices for Multi-Node Training on ABCI with PyTorch
item.description: This article summarizes a simple method for conducting distributed training with ABCI which is the GPU cloud computing service by AIST. The following repository provides a simple example of training codes on ABCI with support for multi-node training. https://github.com/yukara-ikemiya/abci-code-sample Let’s use ABCI for training large-scale models AI Bridging Cloud Infrastructure (ABCI) is the world’s first large-scale Open AI Computing Infrastructure, constructed and operated by National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology (AIST).
